import React from 'react'; import { Card, Title, Text, Group, Button, Stack, Paper, Divider, Box } from '@mantine/core'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); return (
Dashboard Welcome back, {user?.username || 'User'} This is your private dashboard. You have successfully logged in to the system. Your Profile Information Username: {user?.username || 'Not available'} Email: {user?.email || 'Not available'} User ID: {user?.id || 'Not available'} Account Actions
); }; export default Dashboard;
